title: Real mint sauce
description: Mint grows so freely that once you know the trick you never need buy mint sauce again.
steps: Strip off the mint leaves, sprinkle with salt and chop finely.
Place into a jug, add the sugar and pour over the boiling water, stir and leave to cool.
Stir in the vinegar and taste.
Add more water or vinegar and adjust seasoning to suit your taste.
